EmailTemplate.description: After users sample has been received at the lab
EmailTemplate.name: Thank You and Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback for Helix
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You
Thank you again for participating in the Helix Alpha program! Your collection kits have been received at our lab in San Diego. At this time, the samples will be de-identified from your personal information and go through our sequencing process.
As a last step, we’d appreciate your feedback on how the process went. Your feedback is crucial to help us make Helix the best experience it can be.
Feedback survey https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/helixalpha Cheers,
The Helix Team
Contact us if you have any questions: alpha@helix.com
Unsubscribe
